name: soapdenovo-trans

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
SOAPdenovo-Trans is a de novo transcriptome assembler basing on the
SOAPdenovo framework, adapt to alternative splicing and different
expression level among transcripts.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: samtools
dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
